pages.disclaimer: Disclaimer - Important Information about CricketBoost Fantasy Cricket App Home About FAQ Download Disclaimer General Information Welcome to CricketBoost, your ultimate fantasy cricket app. Here you can enjoy a thrilling experience of fantasy cricket gaming. However, please note the following: Responsibility This app is for entertainment purposes only. We do not promote or encourage any form of gambling. Users are responsible for their own actions and decisions while using the app. All data provided within the app is for informational purposes. By using CricketBoost, you agree to abide by our terms and conditions. Terms and Conditions By using CricketBoost, you agree to abide by our Terms & Conditions. Please read them carefully. Privacy Your privacy is important to us. Please read our Privacy Policy to understand how we handle your personal information. Disclaimer of Liability CricketBoost and its affiliates shall not be responsible or liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or exemplary damages resulting from your use of the app. Changes to This Disclaimer We may update this Disclaimer from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Disclaimer on this page. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.index: Experience CricketBoost - Your Ultimate Fantasy Cricket Platform Home About FAQ Download Welcome to CricketBoost CricketBoost is your ultimate destination for fantasy cricket enthusiasts. Join now and experience the thrill of managing your own cricket team, competing with others, and winning exciting prizes. Join CricketBoost Now About CricketBoost CricketBoost is a cutting-edge fantasy cricket platform that allows users to immerse themselves in the excitement of cricket. Create your dream team, participate in various contests, and stand a chance to win amazing rewards. With real-time updates and detailed statistics, CricketBoost offers an unparalleled experience for cricket enthusiasts. Main Matches & News Page The main page of CricketBoost featuring matches and news updates. News Page Stay updated with the latest cricket news on CricketBoost's news page. Upcoming Matches Page Check out upcoming cricket matches on CricketBoost's upcoming matches page. Match Events Stay updated with live match events and commentary on CricketBoost. Top Players Explore the top players and their performances on CricketBoost. Team Lineups Check out the team lineups and strategies on CricketBoost. Frequently Asked Questions What is CricketBoost? + CricketBoost is a platform that provides the latest updates on cricket matches, news, player stats, and team lineups. How do I register? + You can register by clicking on the 'Sign Up' button on the homepage and filling in your details. Can I watch live matches on CricketBoost? + No, CricketBoost provides live updates and commentary, but it does not stream live matches. How much does CricketBoost cost? + CricketBoost is completely free to use. Enjoy all features without any cost. How can I get the latest cricket news? + You can get the latest cricket news by visiting the 'News' section on CricketBoost. What features does CricketBoost offer? + CricketBoost offers live match updates, news, player stats, team lineups, and more to keep you updated on all things cricket. Download the app By reaching out, you agree to our Privacy Policy. Download Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.privacy: Privacy Policy - Your Privacy Matters at CricketBoost Fantasy Cricket App Home About FAQ Download Privacy Policy Introduction Welcome to CricketBoost's Privacy Policy. Your privacy is important to us. This policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your personal information when you use our fantasy cricket app. Information We Collect We collect information that you provide to us voluntarily when using CricketBoost, such as your name, email address, and demographic information. We may also collect usage data, device information, and cookies to improve our services. How We Use Your Information We use your information to provide and personalize our services, communicate with you, and improve our app's functionality. Your data helps us deliver relevant content, suggest features, and enhance user experience. Sharing of Your Information We do not sell your personal information to third parties. However, we may share your information with service providers who assist us in operating our app or conducting our business, subject to confidentiality agreements. These providers include cloud hosting services, analytics platforms, and customer support tools. Security of Your Information We prioritize the security of your personal information. We implement technical and organizational measures to protect against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction of your data. Despite our efforts, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is completely secure. We encourage you to take precautions to protect your information. Your Choices and Rights You have the right to access, update, or delete your personal information. If you wish to exercise these rights or have questions about our data practices, please contact us using the information provided in our app. Cookies and Tracking Technologies CricketBoost uses cookies and similar tracking technologies to enhance user experience, analyze usage patterns, and personalize content and advertisements. You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings or device controls. Children's Privacy CricketBoost is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If you are a parent or guardian and believe your child has provided us with personal information, please contact us so that we can delete it. Changes to This Privacy Policy We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices and legal requirements. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Privacy Policy within our app. Please review this Privacy Policy periodically for any updates. Your continued use of CricketBoost after changes to this Privacy Policy constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
pages.terms: Terms & Conditions - Understand the Rules of CricketBoost Fantasy Cricket App Home About FAQ Download Terms & Conditions Introduction Welcome to CricketBoost's Terms & Conditions. These terms outline the rules and regulations for using our fantasy cricket app. By accessing CricketBoost, you agree to comply with these terms. If you disagree with any part of these terms, please do not use our app. Use of Our App You must be at least 18 years old to use CricketBoost. By using our app, you warrant that you are at least 18 years old and have the legal capacity to enter into this agreement. Account Registration When you register with CricketBoost, you agree to provide accurate and complete information. You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account. Prohibited Activities While using CricketBoost, you agree not to engage in any unlawful, offensive, or harmful behavior. This includes but is not limited to: violating any laws, infringing intellectual property rights, or disrupting our app's functionality. Content Ownership All content and materials provided within CricketBoost, including but not limited to text, graphics, logos, and images, are the property of CricketBoost or its licensors. You may not reproduce, distribute, modify, or create derivative works without our explicit permission. Limitation of Liability CricketBoost and its affiliates shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or exemplary damages arising from your use of our app. This includes but is not limited to loss of data, loss of profits, or business interruption. Changes to Terms & Conditions We may update these Terms & Conditions from time to time. We will notify you of any material changes by posting the updated Terms & Conditions within our app. Your continued use of CricketBoost after changes to these terms constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms. Governing Law These Terms & Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Your Jurisdiction, without regard to its conflict of law provisions. Disclaimer Privacy Policy Terms & Conditions
